APPLICATIONS OP University of California, Berkeley
Creighton University
In the tabulation of votes for the above two institutions, it was found
that there wore no negative votes, but a number of voters withhold their
vote pending the receipt of more detailed information concerning their
activities.
Consequently, letters were sent out asking for more information. As soon
as it is received, it will be forwarded to the Membership Committee Chair
man who will again circularize the Board and Committee,
«***»*•**«
